MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 postcode area of Flint, affecting properties in Lloyd Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:00PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:15AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:24PM on 31st March 2021.
